response.overview: A collaborative performance piece for hand painted 16mm film, found footage, and live improvised sound by Justin Rhody, Abigail Smith, and Ben Kujawski. The video version soundtrack was recorded live at Shapeshifters Cinema in Oakland CA on Dec 11th 2022. The title of the piece was decided by Craig Baldwin before a live audience at Other Cinema in San Francisco the night before. Kujawski, Smith and Rhody perform as a sound ensemble under the name K/S/R. Most of their recordings are made in movie theaters after-hours.
response.title: Same Old Santa
